WItem.en-US: Log In error. Please try again.
WItem.zh-TW: 登錄時發生錯誤, 請重新輸入.

WItem.en-US:
Changeing Waveface Station user will cause {0} unable to access archived original image files.
Proceed anyway?
WItem.zh-TW:
變更Station使用者後, {0} 將無法下載已保存的原始圖檔
繼續執行嗎?

WItem.en-US:
User '{0}' is unassociated with Waveface Station successfully.
Please restart Waveface to continue assign a new Waveface Station user
WItem.zh-TW:
Waveface Station已經成功的和 {0} 分離
請重新啟動程式後繼續指定Waveface Station使用者
